com.software.reuze

Interface d_i_Map

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    d_MapAustraliaRoadsSimplified, d_MapExtendable, d_MapRomaniaRoadsSimplified

    public interface d_i_Map
    Provides a general interface for maps.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Double getDistance(String fromLocation, String toLocation)
      Returns the travel distance between the two specified locations if they are linked by a connection and null otherwise.
      List<String> getLocations()
      Returns a list of all locations.
      List<String> getLocationsLinkedTo(String fromLocation)
      Answers to the question: Where can I get, following one of the connections starting at the specified location?
      ga_Point getPosition(String loc)
      Returns the position of the specified location.
      String randomlyGenerateDestination()
      Returns a location which is selected by random.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocations

        List<String> getLocations()
        Returns a list of all locations.

      • getLocationsLinkedTo

        List<String> getLocationsLinkedTo(String fromLocation)
        Answers to the question: Where can I get, following one of the connections starting at the specified location?

      • getDistance

        Double getDistance(String fromLocation,
                 String toLocation)
        Returns the travel distance between the two specified locations if they are linked by a connection and null otherwise.

      • getPosition

        ga_Point getPosition(String loc)
        Returns the position of the specified location. The position is represented by two coordinates, e.g. latitude and longitude values.

      • randomlyGenerateDestination

        String randomlyGenerateDestination()
        Returns a location which is selected by random.
